Learn More...

The cost involved for one copyright registration with the US Copyright Office ranges anywhere from $35 to $220, if you should be doing this for every original creation you are in to, then you should be spending more. But since you need US Copyright Office only in situations where you are dealing with infringements, litigation, and statutory damages, it is enough to create low-cost proof of ownership by making use of simple online copyright registration process. In situations, where you will have to deal with litigation you can register with US Copyright Office and produce your earliest ownership proof created with our app as an additional proof to proceed with winnable US copyright Office Registration based litigation. 
Be Smart… Start small… Feel Safe…
